languages.text: {n}Изможденный мужчина в рясе астропата держится прямо, но его голос дрожит от ярости.{/n} "Я мастер Анжелио, представитель хора астропатов Даргонуса. Эти вероломные невежды выдают бредни своих жертв за истину! Ваша Светлость, кто угодно под пытками расскажет любую чушь, лишь бы остановить мучения. Мы десятилетиями безупречно служили династии фон Валанциус, а мастер Прас — прежде всех! Прикажите им отступить, прошу вас".
languages.translation_comment: Кадр на левую сторону весов. После куя кадр на Весы. После куя представитель кладет на чашу посох астропата. Спикер уходит в дверь.
Кадр на левую сторону весов. После куя кадр на Весы. После куя представитель кладет на чашу посох астропата. Спикер уходит в дверь.

languages.text: {n}The gaunt man dressed in Astropath's robes is standing tall, but his voice trembles with fury.{/n} "I am Master Anjelio. I represent the Dargonus Astropathic Choir. These insidious and ignorant people are passing off their victims' ravings as truth! Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, people will say anything under torture just to make the agony stop. We have served House von Valancius faithfully for decades, Master Pras the longest of all! Please, order them to stand down."
languages.original_text: {n}Изможденный мужчина в рясе астропата держится прямо, но его голос дрожит от ярости.{/n} "Я мастер Анжелио, представитель хора астропатов Даргонуса. Эти вероломные невежды выдают бредни своих жертв за истину! Ваша Светлость, кто угодно под пытками расскажет любую чушь, лишь бы остановить мучения. Мы десятилетиями безупречно служили династии фон Валанциус, а мастер Прас — прежде всех! Прикажите им отступить, прошу вас".

traits.locale_text: {n}The gaunt man in an Astropath's robe is standing tall, but his voice trembles with fury.{/n} "I am Master Anjelio, representing the Dargonus Astropathic Choir. These insidious and ignorant people are passing off their victims' ravings as truth! Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, anyone will say any nonsense under torture just to make the agony stop. We have served House von Valancius faithfully for decades, Master Pras the longest of all! Please order them to stand down."

These insidious and ignorant people are passing off their victims' ravings as truth! Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, people will say anything under torture just to make the agony stop. We have served House von Valancius faithfully for decades, Master Pras the longest of all! Please, order them to stand down."

languages.text: {n}Der hagere Mann in den Roben eines Astropathen steht aufrecht, aber seine Stimme zittert vor Wut.{/n} "Ich bin Meister Anjelio. Ich vertrete den astropathischen Chor von Dargonus. Diese hinterlistigen und ignoranten Leute verkaufen das irre Gerede ihrer Opfer als Wahrheit! Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, unter Folter sagen Menschen alles, um ihrem Leid ein Ende zu machen. Wir sind Haus von Valancius seit Jahrzehnten treu ergeben, das gilt insbesondere für Meister Pras! Bitte befehlt ihnen, sich zurückzuziehen."
languages.original_text: {n}The gaunt man dressed in Astropath's robes is standing tall, but his voice trembles with fury.{/n} "I am Master Anjelio. I represent the Dargonus Astropathic Choir. These insidious and ignorant people are passing off their victims' ravings as truth! Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, people will say anything under torture just to make the agony stop. We have served House von Valancius faithfully for decades, Master Pras the longest of all! Please, order them to stand down."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der hagere Mann in den Roben eines Astropathen steht aufrecht, aber seine Stimme zittert vor Wut.{/n} "Ich bin Meister Anjelio. Ich vertrete den astropathischen Chor von Dargonus. Diese hinterlistigen und ignoranten Leute verkaufen das irre Gerede ihrer Opfer als Wahrheit! Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, unter Folter sagen Menschen alles, um ihrem Leid ein Ende zu machen. Wir sind Haus von Valancius seit Jahrzehnten treu ergeben, das gilt insbesondere für Meister Pras! Bitte befehlt ihnen, sich zurückzuziehen."

languages.text: {n}L'homme qui prend la parole ensuite a les traits tirés et porte l'habit des astropathes. Il se tient parfaitement droit, mais sa voix tremble de colère.{/n} « Je suis maître Anjelio et je représente le chœur astropathique de Dargonus. Ces individus aussi insidieux qu'ignorants voudraient faire passer les divagations de leurs victimes pour la vérité ! Votre Seigneurie, les gens sont prêts à dire n'importe quoi sous la torture pour faire cesser leur supplice. Nous servons fidèlement la maison von Valancius depuis des décennies et maître Pras est le plus ancien de nos membres ! Je vous en supplie, ordonnez-leur de se retirer. »
languages.original_text: {n}The gaunt man dressed in Astropath's robes is standing tall, but his voice trembles with fury.{/n} "I am Master Anjelio. I represent the Dargonus Astropathic Choir. These insidious and ignorant people are passing off their victims' ravings as truth! Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, people will say anything under torture just to make the agony stop. We have served House von Valancius faithfully for decades, Master Pras the longest of all! Please, order them to stand down."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'homme qui prend la parole ensuite a les traits tirés et porte l'habit des astropathes. Il se tient parfaitement droit, mais sa voix tremble de colère.{/n} « Je suis maître Anjelio et je représente le chœur astropathique de Dargonus. Ces individus aussi insidieux qu'ignorants voudraient faire passer les divagations de leurs victimes pour la vérité ! Votre Seigneurie, les gens sont prêts à dire n'importe quoi sous la torture pour faire cesser leur supplice. Nous servons fidèlement la maison von Valancius depuis des décennies et maître Pras est le plus ancien de nos membres ! Je vous en supplie, ordonnez-leur de se retirer. »

languages.text: {n}穿着星语唱诗班长袍的男人瘦骨嶙峋。他站在原地，挺直腰杆，声音由于愤怒而颤抖着。{/n}“我是安杰里奥大师，我代表达戈努斯的星语唱诗班。那些阴险无知的恶人，不过将受害者的胡言乱语当成了真相！‘屈打成招’这句话可不是白说的，大人。我们勤勤恳恳地侍奉了冯·瓦兰修斯家族几十年，而普拉斯大师是我们之中侍奉王朝最久的！求求您，让那些人住手吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}The gaunt man dressed in Astropath's robes is standing tall, but his voice trembles with fury.{/n} "I am Master Anjelio. I represent the Dargonus Astropathic Choir. These insidious and ignorant people are passing off their victims' ravings as truth! Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, people will say anything under torture just to make the agony stop. We have served House von Valancius faithfully for decades, Master Pras the longest of all! Please, order them to stand down."

traits.locale_text: {n}穿着星语唱诗班长袍的男人瘦骨嶙峋。他站在原地，挺直腰杆，声音由于愤怒而颤抖着。{/n}“我是安杰里奥大师，我代表达戈努斯的星语唱诗班。那些阴险无知的恶人，不过将受害者的胡言乱语当成了真相！‘屈打成招’这句话可不是白说的，大人。我们勤勤恳恳地侍奉了冯·瓦兰修斯家族几十年，而普拉斯大师是我们之中侍奉王朝最久的！求求您，让那些人住手吧。”

languages.text: {n}El hombre enjuto con túnica de Astrópata se yergue, y, con voz temblorosa por la furia, proclama:{/n} «Soy el maestro Anjelio, representante del Coro de Astrópatas de Dargonus. ¡Esta gente, pérfida e ignorante, quiere hacer pasar los delirios de sus víctimas por verdades! Mi{mf|lord|lady}, la gente confesará lo que sea con tal de que la tortura cese. Hemos servido fielmente a la casa von Valancius durante décadas, ¡especialmente el maestro Pras! Por favor, ordéneles que se detengan».
languages.original_text: {n}The gaunt man dressed in Astropath's robes is standing tall, but his voice trembles with fury.{/n} "I am Master Anjelio. I represent the Dargonus Astropathic Choir. These insidious and ignorant people are passing off their victims' ravings as truth! Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, people will say anything under torture just to make the agony stop. We have served House von Valancius faithfully for decades, Master Pras the longest of all! Please, order them to stand down."

traits.locale_text: {n}El hombre enjuto con túnica de Astrópata se yergue, y, con voz temblorosa por la furia, proclama:{/n} «Soy el maestro Anjelio, representante del Coro de Astrópatas de Dargonus. ¡Esta gente, pérfida e ignorante, quiere hacer pasar los delirios de sus víctimas por verdades! Mi{mf|lord|lady}, la gente confesará lo que sea con tal de que la tortura cese. Hemos servido fielmente a la casa von Valancius durante décadas, ¡especialmente el maestro Pras! Por favor, ordéneles que se detengan».

languages.text: {n}感応通信官のローブに身を包んだやせ形の男は、背筋を伸ばして立っているが、その声は怒りに震えている。{/n}「私はマスター・アンヘリオ。ダルゴナス感応通信聖歌隊の代表です。この陰湿で無知な連中は、犠牲者の戯言を真実のように言いふらしています！閣下、人は拷問を受けると、苦痛を和らげるためなら何でも言うものです。私たちは何十年もの間、フォン・ヴァランシウス家に忠実に仕えてきました！特にマスター・プラスは最長です！どうか、彼らに証人席から降りるように命じてください」
languages.original_text: {n}The gaunt man dressed in Astropath's robes is standing tall, but his voice trembles with fury.{/n} "I am Master Anjelio. I represent the Dargonus Astropathic Choir. These insidious and ignorant people are passing off their victims' ravings as truth! Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, people will say anything under torture just to make the agony stop. We have served House von Valancius faithfully for decades, Master Pras the longest of all! Please, order them to stand down."

traits.locale_text: {n}感応通信官のローブに身を包んだやせ形の男は、背筋を伸ばして立っているが、その声は怒りに震えている。{/n}「私はマスター・アンヘリオ。ダルゴナス感応通信聖歌隊の代表です。この陰湿で無知な連中は、犠牲者の戯言を真実のように言いふらしています！閣下、人は拷問を受けると、苦痛を和らげるためなら何でも言うものです。私たちは何十年もの間、フォン・ヴァランシウス家に忠実に仕えてきました！特にマスター・プラスは最長です！どうか、彼らに証人席から降りるように命じてください」

languages.text: {n}Üzerine Astropat cübbesi atmış çelimsiz adamın sesi, dimdik duruşuna rağmen öfkeden titriyor.{/n} "Ben Üstat Anjelio. Dargonus Astropatik Korosu'nu temsilen buradayım. Bu sinsi ve cahil güruh, kurbanlarının taşkınlığını hakikat diye yutturmaya çalışıyor! İşkencenin pençesindeki insanlar, ızdırapları bitsin diye can havliyle ağızlarına geleni söylerler {mf|Lordum|Leydim}. Bizler von Valancius Hanesi'ne olan hizmetimizi yıllar boyunca sadakatimizden kusur etmeden sürdürdük. Bilhassa da Üstat Pras! Geri çekilmelerini emretmenizi talep ediyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}The gaunt man dressed in Astropath's robes is standing tall, but his voice trembles with fury.{/n} "I am Master Anjelio. I represent the Dargonus Astropathic Choir. These insidious and ignorant people are passing off their victims' ravings as truth! Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, people will say anything under torture just to make the agony stop. We have served House von Valancius faithfully for decades, Master Pras the longest of all! Please, order them to stand down."

traits.locale_text: {n}Üzerine Astropat cübbesi atmış çelimsiz adam, dimdik duruşuna rağmen konuşurken sesi öfkeden titriyor.{/n} "Ben Üstat Anjelio. Dargonus Astropat Korosu'nu temsilen buradayım. Bu sinsi ve cahil güruh, kurbanlarının taşkınlığını hakikat diye yutturmaya çalışıyor! {mf|Lordum|Leydim}, işkencenin pençesindeki insanlar ızdırapları bitsin diye can havliyle ağızlarına geleni söylerler. Bizler Von Valancius Hanesi'ne olan hizmetimizi yıllar boyunca sadakatimizden kusur etmeden sürdürdük. Bilhassa da Üstat Pras! Geri çekilmelerini emretmenizi talep ediyorum."
